ResearchProjectDef.label: mechanite forge
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the secrets of the fabled Mechanite Forge and ability to extract Mechanites out of Luciferum. First step toward ascension.

ResearchProjectDef.label: mechanite fabrication
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to make your own mechanites from scratch using the Mechanite Forge.

ResearchProjectDef.label: luciferium fabrication
ResearchProjectDef.description: Rediscover the secrets to how to fabricate Luciferium from ages past.

ResearchProjectDef.label: neutroamine synthesizing
ResearchProjectDef.description: There are many methods to synthesize Neutroamine on the rim but this method utilize the seeming magic of Mechanites to extract amino acids out of food for use in pharmaceuticals.

ResearchProjectDef.label: plasteel fabrication
ResearchProjectDef.description: Through clever use of mechanites it is possible to rearrange the molecular structure of steel into plasteel. The process is not perfect though. A little is lost during fabrication.

ResearchProjectDef.label: herculium fabrication
ResearchProjectDef.description: Formulates a benign variant of fibrous mechanites which also cures the affliction. Enhances physical attributes of the consumer.

ResearchProjectDef.label: peithium fabrication
ResearchProjectDef.description: Formulates a benign variant of sensory mechanites which also cures the affliction. Enhances social and sensory attributes of the consumer.

ResearchProjectDef.label: seraphium fabrication
ResearchProjectDef.description: Using what you learnt from fabricating your own mechanites and the Luciferium drug you are able to devise a completely new miracle drug which greatly increase the fortitude of a living being.

ResearchProjectDef.label: bastion fabrication
ResearchProjectDef.description: By combining shield and mechanite technology you have now devised a combat oriented drug that give your soldiers that extra edge on the battlefield by shielding them.

ResearchProjectDef.label: addiction purifier fabrication
ResearchProjectDef.description: Bordering on science and fiction, this wonder drug created by the brightest minds of the universe got the power to purify the body of a living being from all addictions, both psychological and physical.\n\nMay be the way out for beings who took on the devils bargain.

ResearchProjectDef.label: trollblood fabrication
ResearchProjectDef.description: The perfect companion drug to Seraphium. Imbues the ingester with immense regeneration capabilities. Even cures them of old scars bringing back their youth.
